ARABIC: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And if he is one of the misguided deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But if he is of the deniers and the errants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if he is one of those who give the lie (to this Message) and go astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If it is of those who have rejected the Truth and have gone astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if he is from the deniers, the astray, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But if he be of the denying, the erring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if he is one of the rejecters, the erring ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But if he be of them that cried lies, and went astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But if he is of the rejecters, the erring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But if he is one of those who rejected [the truth] and went astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if he be of the beliers, the erring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But if he be of the impugners, the astray ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if he be of those who treat (Truth) as Falsehood, who go wrong,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But if he (the dying person) be of the denying (of the Resurrection), the erring (away from the Right Path of Islamic Monotheism),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, if he is of those who belied, and went astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if he is one of the deniers, the mistaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:92] But if he be of the deniers, the erring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But if he is of the rejecters) of Allah, His Messenger and His Scripture, (the erring) from faith,
